item.title: Markdown Converter
item.description: Markdown Converter is a simple Google Docs add-on. It does only one thing: converting Markdown syntax in selected content to Google Docs styles. Background The reason why Markdown Converter was created is that Google Docs does not support Markdown-style formats that allows quickly typing source codes. For example, to enter variableName, you need to first enter “varibleName”, then select the text with your mouse, and choose a monospace font from the font menu.
